articles.description: Latest football news and reaction following Liverpool's draw with Manchester United, leaving Arsenal top of the Premier League.

articles.description: Vinicius Jr has overcome the odds to reach the top, but nothing could have prepared him for what he would face in Spain.

articles.description: Masters champion Jon Rahm's move to LIV could prove a "tipping point" in the battle for the future of the men's professional game, writes Iain Carter.

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy says Liverpool's draw at Old Trafford is not the end of the world for their title hopes - but they should have secured all three points.
articles.title: 'Positives for Liverpool - but a big chance missed'

articles.description: Caitlin Clark says her impact on women's sport has been "the coolest part" of her journey as her record-breaking collegiate basketball career comes to a close.
articles.title: Caitlin Clark's impact on women's sport 'coolest part of journey' as collegiate basketball career ends

articles.description: Russ Cook, nicknamed "Hardest Geezer", has finished his challenge of running the length of Africa.

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp warns Manchester United they will lose to Arsenal next month if they don't improve on their Old Trafford performance against his side.
articles.title: Klopp warns Man Utd must improve to beat Arsenal

articles.description: Assistant manager John Kennedy and colleagues were targeted during Sunday's game against Rangers.
articles.title: Celtic make police complaint over missiles thrown at staff
